fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - A few things you talk about or say in day chat might become true, even when referring to something else or talking in past tense, up to the host to pick what they deem balanced, they may pick negative stuff to balance it out too.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Silence immune
- The scumteam will be told at the start of the game that a Cursed Hopesayer exists, and they get one guess as to who it is. If they guess correctly, the Cursed Hopesayer dies on the spot, none of this may be prevented by the Cursed Hopesayer in any way.
